metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12869 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The multiauth module in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.13 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass authentication context restrictions and use an authentication source defined in config/authsources.php via vectors related to improper validation of user input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12869` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
